messages.subject: Mei Titles
messages.msgSnippet: All. when looking through my books, I was reading into titles, such as Kami, Daijo^, Suke etc. and in Hawleys ( I never know whether to trust this book or not
messages.messageBody:
All. when looking through my books, I was reading into titles, such as
Kami, Daijo^, Suke etc. and in Hawleys ( I never know whether to trust
this book or not ) it lists in order of importance, Kami, then Daijo^,
then runs Jo^ and Suke as evens. Then in Robinson's The Arts of the
Japanese Sword, he places the emphasis of importance starting at Kami,
then Suku and Daijo^ are next followed up with Jo^.

Is there a rule for this, are they all as important as each other at the
end of the day, which is correct if either and if not, the what ?.

cheers in advance.

Rich T
